00023 /* "Times" API : bridgeTime, rootTimes, portTimes, designatedTimes, msgTimes */
00024 
00025 #ifndef _RSTP_TIMES_H__
00026 #define _RSTP_TIMES_H__
00027 
00028 typedef struct timevalues_t {
00029   unsigned short MessageAge;
00030   unsigned short MaxAge;
00031   unsigned short ForwardDelay;
00032   unsigned short HelloTime;
00033   /*unsigned short MigrateTime;*/   /*kd: RSTP parametrs.. aus 801.2D*/
00034 } TIMEVALUES_T;
00035 
00036 int STP_compare_times (IN TIMEVALUES_T* t1, IN TIMEVALUES_T* t2);
00037 void STP_get_times (IN BPDU_BODY_T* b, OUT TIMEVALUES_T* v);
00038 void STP_set_times (IN TIMEVALUES_T* v, OUT BPDU_BODY_T* b);
00039 void STP_copy_times (OUT TIMEVALUES_T* t, IN TIMEVALUES_T* f);

00041 #endif /* _RSTP_TIMES_H__ */
